#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int dp[5005][4][2][5005];
int n, m;
string s;
const int mod = (int)1e9 + 7;

int f(int idx, int nstr, int open, int na)
{
	if(nstr > 3)	return 0;
	if(idx==n)	return (nstr==3 and na>=m);
	if(dp[idx][nstr][open][na]!=-1)	return dp[idx][nstr][open][na];

	int ans = 0;
	if(open)	{
		//include in same substr
		ans = (ans + f(idx+1, nstr, open, na + (s[idx]=='a') ))%mod;
		//include in new substr
		ans = (ans + f(idx+1, nstr+1, open, na + (s[idx]=='a') ))%mod;
		//do not include
		ans = (ans + f(idx+1, nstr, 0, na))%mod;
	}
	else	{
		//do not include
		ans = (ans + f(idx+1, nstr, 0, na))%mod;
		//include
		ans = (ans + f(idx+1, nstr+1, 1, na + (s[idx] == 'a')))%mod;
	}
	return dp[idx][nstr][open][na] = ans;
}

int main()
{
	int t; cin>>t;
	while(t--)	{
		cin>>s>>m;
		n = s.size();
		for(int i=0; i<n+5; i++)	for(int j=0; j<4; j++)	for(int k=0; k<2; k++)	for(int l=0; l<n+5; l++)
			dp[i][j][k][l] = -1;
		
		cout<<f(0,0,0,0)<<endl;
	}
}
